description:
The first item ever created. It looks
like it'll fall apart any minute.
name: Ancient Key
note: <Menu Category: Memorabilia>

description:
It's just a leek? Get enough of these, and you
might find that looking was worth your while...
name: Leek

description: A simple yellow flower. It's very common.
name: Yellow Flower
note: <Sell Price: 1>

description:
A red flower. It's slightly less common than
yellow flowers, but not by much.
name: Red Flower
note: <Sell Price: 2>

description:
A blue flower. It's somewhat rare in
comparison to other plants.
name: Blue Flower
note: <Sell Price: 3>

description:
A small package you need to bring to the
Village Headman. What could be inside...
name: Small Package

description:
An old key found in a crate in the Village Headman's
house. It's oddly shaped. It feels out of this world...
name: Old Key
note: <Menu Category: Memorabilia>

description:
A bottle of clean water. It has quite a few uses, its
main one being recovering a small amount of HP.
name: Water Bottle
note:
<Custom Show Eval>
visible = !$gameTemp.bagOrganized();
</Custom Show Eval>

description:
A small potion. It has an invigorating
taste. If only they were cheaper...
name: Small Potion

description:
A map of Adon. It should help guide you all
the way down the continent.
name: Map of Adon

description:
An empty book given to you by the Village Headman.
The pages are blank - try to fill 'em up!
name: Quest Log

description: A sticky vial of gel you collected from a Green Slime.
name: Green Gel
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x1 Ground Monster Parts: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

<Custom Show Eval>
visible = !$gameTemp.bagOrganized();
</Custom Show Eval>

description:
Some loot that the Banditos pilfered from the
citizens of somewhere. It'd be best to return it.
name: Bandito Loot

description:
An MP-healing variant of the \ii[9]. It
sparkles slightly. Is there a still version?
name: Small Elixir

description:
A key to Room 1 of the Verdin Village inn.
It's a literal key item.
name: Room 1 Key

description:
A ration of food. It smells delicious, and
will surely taste delicious... mmm!
name: Ration
note: <Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

description:
A magic bag made by Matilda. It allows all
your team members to access the same inventory.
name: Void Bag

description:
It's a tent. There's nothing too special about it.
It does fold nicely into a little container, though.
name: Tent

description:
An even tastier ration. It smells more delicious than
ever, and will surely taste incredible... mmm!
name: Fulfilling Ration
note: <Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

description:
A vial of gel you collected from a Blue Slime.
It looks like water... why not give it a taste?
name: Blue Gel
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x1-x2 Ground Monster Parts: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

<Custom Show Eval>
visible = !$gameTemp.bagOrganized();
</Custom Show Eval>

description:
Telluria is a vast continent featuring a wide
variety of biomes to accompany its grasslands.
name: Map of Telluria
note: Was once the Ration (Rat Jerky).

description:
It's some fur from a Giant Rat. Gross! It can't
make anything useful, so you might as well sell it.
name: Rat Fur
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x1-x2 Ground Monster Parts: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

description:
A dusty old book. When read, your EXP from
battles will get a boost. Lasts 800 steps.
name: Tome of Experience
note: <Menu Category: Buffs>

description:
An old bit of Kevin's cape that tore off
in your battle with him.
name: Scrap of Kevin's Cape
note: <Menu Category: Memorabilia>

description:
An annoyingly hard-to-handle key. All it
opens is the cells in the Bandito Hideout.
name: Cell Key

description:
A strange badge you found in Four-Toed Kevin's room.
It fills you with the desire to take on a strong foe.
name: Mysterious Red Badge
note: <Menu Category: Memorabilia>

description:
A smooth cherry-flavored drink that boosts
your MHP by 15%. Lasts for 15 turns.
name: Vital Cola

description:
A fizzy blueberry-flavored drink that boosts
your MMP by 15%. Lasts for 15 turns.
name: Mana Fizz

description:
A viscous almond-flavored drink that boosts
your DEF by 15%. Lasts for 15 turns.
name: Rocky Sip

description:
A spicy grape-flavored drink that boosts
your MAT by 15%. Lasts for 15 turns.
name: Arcanic Chug

description:
Some cool looking dust that Bob and James found.
It might be gold!... but it's probably just sand.
name: Cool Dust
note: <Sell Price: 1>

description:
Better potions mean less turns spent on
healing. Buy these up! Or use skills.
name: Potion

description:
It's even sparklier than the \ii[14]. You'd
better like the fizz, 'cause there's a lot.
name: Elixir

description:
Recovers a ton of HP and MP. You'd better not be
full just yet - there's a lotta' juice in here.
name: Recovery Vat

description: Boosts the ATK of a weapon by +2.
name: ATK Scroll
note:
<Upgrade Weapon Type: 0>
<Upgrade Effect>
ATK: +2
Prefix: Pointy
</Upgrade Effect>
<Upgrade Tooltip: ATK +2>

description: Boosts the MAT of a weapon by +2.
name: MAT Scroll
note:
<Upgrade Weapon Type: 0>
<Upgrade Effect>
MAT: +2
Prefix: Mystic
</Upgrade Effect>
<Upgrade Tooltip: MAT +2>

description: That's pretty gross...
name: Skeleton Skull
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x2-x3 Ground Monster Parts: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

description:
The bloody, beaten skull of Laeryidyean. Once belonged
to a very strong fighter; now just a simple trophy.
name: Laeryidyean's Skull
note: <Menu Category: Memorabilia>

description:
Blueberries seriously do taste like the color
blue! Boosts MRG by 5%, lasts for 15 turns.
name: Blueberry Sizzle
note:
<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameSwitches.value(103);
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

Was once the Boss Soul (Mini-Boss).

description:
A combination of two drinks that increases
your HRG by 3% and MRG by 5% for 15 turns.
name: Regen Combination
note:
<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameSwitches.value(103);
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

Was once the Boss Soul (Region Boss).

description:
A combination of several drinks that boosts
your core stats and HP/MP regen for 15 turns.
name: Fine-Tuned Combination
note:
<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameSwitches.value(103);
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

Was once the Boss Soul (Dimension Boss).

description:
A never-before seen type of ammunition. It may
have been shot by a heavily modified crossbow.
name: Unknown Projectile
note:
<Menu Category: Memorabilia>

Was once the Letter of Recommendation.

description:
A simple yet versatile crafting item. It can be
used to make a variety of different objects.
name: Wood
note:
<Sell Price: 2>

<Disassemble Pool: Wood>
x1-3 Bark: 100%
x1 Stick: 75%
</Disassemble Pool: Wood>

description:
A small bead of water surrounded by a crystalline
shell. Used to craft a few water-related items.
name: Aqua Gem

description:
A loaf of organic whole wheat bread.
Made with care and tastiness in mind.
name: Loaf of Bread
note: <Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

description:
A good ol' apple: as tasty and revitalizing as always.
You can probably make some apple-based foods with this.
name: Apple
note:
<Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

<Custom Show Eval>
visible = !$gameTemp.bagOrganized();
</Custom Show Eval>

description:
Some bark that you stripped off a piece of wood.
You can probably use it as kindling for a small fire.
name: Bark

description: Boosts the DEF of armor by +2.
name: DEF Scroll
note:
<Upgrade Armor Type: 3, 4, 5>
<Upgrade Effect>
DEF: +2
Prefix: Hard
</Upgrade Effect>
<Upgrade Tooltip: DEF +2>

description: Boosts the MDF of armor by +2.
name: MDF Scroll
note:
<Upgrade Armor Type: 3, 4, 5>
<Upgrade Effect>
MDF: +2
Prefix: Warding
</Upgrade Effect>
<Upgrade Tooltip: MDF +2>

description:
Allows basic disassembling of softer items, typically
clothing and food. Cannot work with metal items.
name: Basic Salvage Kit
note:
<Disassembler: Basic>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Crude Hammer
Copper Cluster: 3
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Common Salvager>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
A piece of cloth salvaged from an well-worn piece
of clothing. Only somewhat useful when in bulk.
name: Worn Cloth

description:
A small feather appearing to have originated
from the plumage of a small bird.
name: Feather

description:
It's easily dyed and is used to make a variety of
fine attire. Can be bought or salvaged from clothing.
name: Yarn
note: <Sell Price: 5>

description:
Reverts all changes and upgrades on any weapon or
piece of equipment, freeing up all upgrade slots.
name: Cleansing Scroll
note:
<Upgrade Weapon Type: 0>
<Upgrade Armor Type: 0>
<Upgrade Effect>
Slots: 0
Reset Full
</Upgrade Effect>

description:
Useful for forging steel, but it's a shame
to find a lump of this in your stocking.
name: Coal
note:
<Menu Category: Mining>
<Sell Price: 10>

Was once the Telluria Map Fragment.

description: I got a rock.
name: Rock
note: <Menu Category: Mining>

description:
Slightly coarse, slightly smooth,
slightly tough, and a great material.
name: Leather

description:
An extremely large fang. Its tip
is sharp enough to cut rocks.
name: Giant Goblin's Fang
note: <Menu Category: Memorabilia>

description:
Trick or treat! Used to purchase special equipment
from the spooky merchant during the spooky season.
name: Pumpkin
note:
<Sell Price: 10>

Was once the Pot with Seed.
Was once the CASTLE FORGE RECIPES.

description:
A gritty chicken-flavored drink that boosts
your ATK by 15%. Lasts for 15 turns.
name: Brawl Brew
note:
<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameSwitches.value(40);
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

description:
A sparkly huckleberry-flavored drink that boosts
your MDF by 15%. Lasts for 15 turns.
name: Warding Swig
note:
<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameSwitches.value(40);
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

description:
A small purse filled with bits and various items.
You retreived it from the Dandy Toads; now return it!
name: Peasant Woman's Purse

description:
Stuck between a rock and a hard place? Drinking this
potion will warp your party to a safe(r) location.
name: Recall Potion
note: Was once the WILL'S RECIPES.

description:
A small bit of iron. The iron ore nodes which provide
these can be commonly found all over Telluria.
name: Iron Cluster
note:
<Menu Category: Mining>
<Sell Price: 15>

description: A powerful red crystal used in a specific crafting recipe.
name: Life Crystal
note:
<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameSwitches.value(95);
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

Was once the itemized Leather Boots.

description: A magical blue crystal used in a specific crafting recipe.
name: Mana Crystal
note:
<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameSelfSwitches.value([209, 16, 'A']);
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

Was once the itemized Bronze Sword â˜….

description:
A small bit of copper. The copper ore nodes which
provide these can be frequently found all over Telluria.
name: Copper Cluster
note:
<Menu Category: Mining>
<Sell Price: 10>

description:
A well-smithed ingot. Bronze is an alloy of tin and copper, but
tin naturally found within forges can create the alloy with time.
name: Bronze Ingot
note:
<Menu Category: Mining>
<Sell Price: 20>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Copper Cluster: 2
Red Gel
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Copper-based Alloy>

description: Good bones and calcium!
name: Milk
note:
<Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

<Custom Show Eval>
visible = !$gameTemp.bagOrganized();
</Custom Show Eval>

Was once the Disposable Hammer.

description:
A combination of a few delicious foods. The
tastes compliment each other quite well.
name: Quick Snack
note:
<Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Apple
Carrot
Loaf of Bread
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Tasty Food Combo>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
A combination of a \ii[9] and \ii[14].
It's smooth yet sparkly at the same time.
name: Small Ether
note:
<Sell Price: 20>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Small Potion
Small Elixir
Sugar Cube
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Small Recovery Combo>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
A combination of a \ii[32] and \ii[33]. Its healing
ability is remarkable, as well as the contrasting flavors!
name: Ether
note:
<Sell Price: 50>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Potion
Elixir
Ice Cube: 3
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Recovery Combo>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
Ripped from the heart of a vigilant automaton.
A key component for forging tellurium weapons.
name: Tellurium Core
note: Was once the DALIA'S RECIPES.

description:
A solid steel ingot. Steel is a simple alloy created by
heating up iron in a blast furnace at high temperatures.
name: Steel Ingot
note:
<Menu Category: Mining>
<Sell Price: 30>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Iron Cluster: 2
Coal
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Iron-based Alloy>

description:
Meant for a single very large eye, but should still work.
Increases several stats at the cost of a little stinging.
name: Medicated Eyedrops
note:
Was once the CLOTHING RECIPES.
Was once the RETRO RECIPES.

description:
A combination of a \ii[192] and \ii[193]. This is
the cream of the crop when it comes to combined healing!
name: Large Ether
note:
<Sell Price: 125>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Large Potion
Large Elixir
Tellurium Alloy
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Large Recovery Combo>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
Summons Fido the skeleton dog. He will disable all
\it[57] effects, but drop rates stay increased.
name: Fido's Collar
note:
<Menu Category: Pets>
<Pet: Fido>

Was once the itemized Bloodlust.
Was once the SHOE RECIPES.

description:
Summons Reggie the monkey. His nature powers
will halve all item respawn times.
name: Reggie's Bananas
note:
<Menu Category: Pets>
<Pet: Reggie>

Was once the Raw Fish.

description:
Important secrets belonging to the Sand Stompers.
Henry would love to take a look at these.
name: Classified Documents
note: Was once the Enchanting Crystal.

description:
It's just a stick, nothing too special.
Used in a few crafting recipes.
name: Stick

description:
A vial filled with red gel. It's too hot for
consumption, but can be thrown to start a fire.
name: Red Gel
note:
<Enemy or Actor Select>

<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x2-x4 Ground Monster Parts: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

description:
The severed wing of a bat. It can be
sold or used as a material for crafting.
name: Bat Wing
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x3-x4 Ground Monster Parts: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

description:
A plump red tomato. Can come in various different
colors, but is typically found and grown red.
name: Tomato
note:
<Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

<Custom Show Eval>
visible = !$gameTemp.bagOrganized();
</Custom Show Eval>

Was once the Itemization Kit.

description:
The essence of hot creatures. Dropped by
fire-related enemies and used for crafting.
name: Fire Essence

description:
The essence of cold creatures. Dropped by
ice-related enemies and used for crafting.
name: Ice Essence

description:
The essence of conductive creatures. Dropped by
electric-related enemies and used for crafting.
name: Electric Essence

description:
The essence of wet creatures. Dropped by
water-related enemies and used for crafting.
name: Water Essence

description:
The essence of rocky creatures. Dropped by
earth-related enemies and used for crafting.
name: Earth Essence

description:
The essence of airy creatures. Dropped by
wind-related enemies and used for crafting.
name: Wind Essence

description:
The essence of holy creatures. Dropped by
light-related enemies and used for crafting.
name: Light Essence

description:
The essence of evil creatures. Dropped by
dark-related enemies and used for crafting.
name: Dark Essence

description:
A skull frequently found in graveyards, placed by
those hoping to bring back a lost loved one.
name: Necrotic Skull
note:
<Synthesis Ingredients>
Skeleton Skull
Dark Essence: 3
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Symbolic Skull>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
Revives a party member with a sliver of HP. A real
one can only be plucked from the ashes of a phoenix.
name: Phoenix Feather Replica
note:
<Synthesis Ingredients>
Feather
Fire Essence: 3
Charcoal: 5
Necrotic Skull
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Revival Feather Replica>
<Synthesis SE: Fire2>

description:
A juicy carrot! It restores a mediocre amount of HP, but
you can probably make better use of it through cooking.
name: Carrot
note:
<Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

<Custom Show Eval>
visible = !$gameTemp.bagOrganized();
</Custom Show Eval>

description:
A small egg taken from the nest of a bird. It's too
messy to eat out in the field, but it's great for cooking.
name: Egg
note: <Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

description:
A simple mushroom plucked from the ground. It restores barely
any HP raw, but it can make or break a recipe.
name: Brown Mushroom
note:
<Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

<Custom Show Eval>
visible = !$gameTemp.bagOrganized();
</Custom Show Eval>

description:
A bit of salt extracted from rocks in Bladesville and
put into a small container. Inedible in this form.
name: Rock Salt
note: <Menu Category: Foodstuffs, Mining>

description:
A simple yet delicious omelet.
The flavor is immaculate!
name: Omelet
note:
<Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Egg
Brown Mushroom: 2
Rock Salt
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Breakfast Dish>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
An ancient relic forged in the shifting sands of the
desert. Has the power to turn back time itself.
name: Archaic Hourglass

description:
An assortment of items that Will needs to keep the
forge going. You should get them back to him!
name: Will's Items

description:
A simple pickaxe required for mining ores. Its
imbalance makes it useless for combat, though.
name: Iron Pickaxe
note: <Menu Category: Mining>

description: Big Mouth's new haircut was no match for your team!
name: Scrap of Big Mouth's Cape
note: <Menu Category: Memorabilia>

description:
Smart Mouth was even cockier than before;
nonetheless, he couldn't best your party.
name: Scrap of Smart Mouth's Cape
note: <Menu Category: Memorabilia>

description:
Douse yourself in this disgusting fluid that will
make monsters leave you alone for 100 steps.
name: Acrid Aroma
note: <Item Ground Monster Parts Buy Price: 25>

description:
Douse yourself in this lovely liquid that will attract
twice as many monsters to you for 150 steps.
name: Eau du Monstere
note: <Item Ground Monster Parts Buy Price: 25>

description:
A variation of mushroom that is extremely poisonous.
Not something you want to eat under any circumstances!
name: Red Mushroom

description:
Some simple uncooked meat from an average-sized bear.
It's unsafe to eat raw, but it's great for cooking.
name: Raw Bear Meat
note:
<Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

<Custom Show Eval>
visible = !$gameTemp.bagOrganized();
</Custom Show Eval>

description:
A simple meal made by cooking meat
and sprinkling some salt over it.
name: Salt-Grilled Bear Meat
note:
<Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Raw Bear Meat
Rock Salt
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Preserved Food>
<Synthesis SE: Fire2>

description:
A strand of wheat, a grain mainly grown in the Easin Plains.
It's inedible, but quite the versatile cooking ingredient.
name: Wheat
note: <Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

description:
A sweet cube of sugar processed from cane harvested
on the shores of Telluria. Cannot be eaten by itself.
name: Sugar Cube
note: <Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

description:
A delicious cake! The apple and blueberry inside
compliment each other pefectly, surprisingly.
name: Fruitcake
note:
<Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Apple: 2
Blueberries: 3
Wheat: 3
Sugar Cube: 3
Milk
Egg
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Fruity Dessert>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
A cluster of blueberries native to the
forests of Adon. Useful for cooking.
name: Blueberries
note:
<Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

<Custom Show Eval>
visible = !$gameTemp.bagOrganized();
</Custom Show Eval>

description:
An inconspicuous belt resonating with a mix of light
and dark power. Wearing it would certainly kill you.
name: The Warden's Belt
note: <Menu Category: Memorabilia>

description:
A broken, beat-up, and useless helmet. Without the power
of soulfire, it has lost its colors and strong magic.
name: Forgotten General's Helmet
note: <Menu Category: Memorabilia>

description:
A tiny pair of boots that once belonged to Henry. His shoe
size is so small that no one in the party can fit in these.
name: Henry's Tiny Boots
note: <Menu Category: Memorabilia>

description:
A silver key that opens the right-most door Sam Payne's
basement. The door leads to the Haven Harbor Underground.
name: Sam's Key

description: A bottle of bitter medicine. Cures \it[39]\c[0].
name: Antidote
note:
<Synthesis Ingredients>
Red Mushroom
Charcoal
Blue Flower
Water Jug
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Poison Preventer>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
A small journal detailing the intricacies
of elements. It was gifted to you by Mark.
name: Element Guide

description:
A book containing the Village Headman's
scribbled notes about classes and equipment.
name: Equipment Guide

description:
A small, tasty berry that grows in warm regions. Heals
a bit of HP and removes cold and wet status effects.
name: Heedup Berry
note:
<Menu Category: Foodstuffs>
<Remove State Category: Ice>
<Remove State Category: Water>

description:
A peculiar book that allows an experienced adventurer to permanently
increase their intelligence. A single person can only read 5 of these.
name: INT Book
note:
<Before Eval>
$gameTemp._actorId = target.actorId();
</Before Eval>

description:
A certificate granted to you for defeating
a rare variant of an enemy. Nice job!
name: Rare Enemy Certificate
note: <Menu Category: Memorabilia>

description:
A poorly made fishing rod. It looks
like it'll snap at any moment.
name: Flimsy Rod
note:
<Menu Category: Fishing>
<rod:3>

description:
A slightly better rod that can catch weak fish faster and easier than
before. It also opens the doors to catch a couple stronger types of fish.
name: Basic Rod
note:
<Menu Category: Fishing>
<rod:5>

description:
A strengthened rod capable of catching
bigger, faster, and stronger fish.
name: Reinforced Rod
note:
<Menu Category: Fishing>
<rod:7>

description:
"I've got bigger fish to fry..." A small,
weak fish found in many open fishing spots.
name: Fathead Carp
note: <Menu Category: Fishing>

description:
A particularly appealing specimen of small fish
due to its red stripe going across its belly.
name: Northern Redbelly Dace
note:
<Menu Category: Fishing>
<bait:2>
<baitSink:1.5>
<baitImg:bait_red>

description:
A weak yet easily accessible bait. Can catch
basic types of small fish, but not much else.
name: Worm
note:
<Menu Category: Fishing>
<bait:1>
<baitSink:1>
<baitImg:bait_pink>

description:
A scrumptious cake! It doesn't really taste
like carrots, but noneless, it's mouthwatering.
name: Carrot Cake
note:
<Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Carrot: 5
Wheat: 3
Sugar Cube: 3
Milk
Egg
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

Was once the Empty Bag.

description:
A handful of generic nuts that could have
been plucked from any old tree or bush.
name: Nuts
note: <Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

description:
A tasty mix of nuts, honey, and oats. It could probably
be used as an ingredient for something even tastier.
name: Granola
note:
<Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Nuts: 5
Honey
Processed Oats: 3
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Breakfast Food + Ingredient>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

<Custom Show Eval>
visible = !$gameTemp.bagOrganized();
</Custom Show Eval>

description:
A ready-to-go and ready-to-eat meal. Crack open
the bag and get munching, whenever and wherever!
name: Earl's Takeout
note:
<Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

Was once the FIRE RECIPES.

description:
A jar of high-quality honey harvested directly
from a bee's nest... or stolen by a bear.
name: Honey
note: <Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

description:
Processed organic oats ready
to be used for cooking.
name: Processed Oats
note:
<Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Oats: 2
Wheat
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Refined Grain>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
A heated cluster of blueberries with all
the moisture evaporated. Inedible on its own.
name: Dried Blueberries
note:
<Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Blueberries
Fiery Powder
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Demoisturized Fruit>
<Synthesis SE: Fire2>

description: The ultimate snack for a long, long journey. Removes debuffs.
name: Trail Mix
note:
<Menu Category: Foodstuffs>
<Remove State Category: debuff>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Granola: 3
Dried Blueberries: 2
Nuts: 5
Heedup Berry
Ether
Monsterous Seasoning: 2
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Wild Snack Mix>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
A prized possession \N[2] brought along with him.
He's a self-proclaimed master at wielding this tool.
name: Cooking Pan
note: Was once the Cooked Fish.

description:
A very old charm you found in a small box. Touching it brings
back someone's strange flashbacks you've never experienced.
name: Ancient Charm
note: <Menu Category: Memorabilia>

description:
An incredibly rare and beautiful phoenix feather. Revives a downed ally,
restores all HP and MP, and increases every stat by 50% for several turns.
name: Phoenix Feather

description:
A mystical feather that allows the owner to jump up to
2 blocks in any direction. Quivers in usable dungeons.
name: Jump Feather

description:
A bottle of ground-up monster parts. So nasty...
Trade it with the Night Merchant for unique items!
name: Ground Monster Parts

description:
A curious portable machine that allows you to
grind monster parts into \ii[141].
name: Monster Part Grinder
note: <Disassembler: Monster>

description:
A strange seasoning created using \ii[141]. It should be
disgusting, but it surprisingly adds a wonderful depth of flavor.
name: Monsterous Seasoning
note:
<Menu Category: Foodstuffs>
<Item Ground Monster Parts Buy Price: 10>
<Sell Price: 1>

description:
A memento of your first encounter with \c[18]Apocalypse\c[0].
\c[18]He\c[0]'d probably be angry if \c[18]he\c[0] knew you had this.
name: Chip of Golden Armor
note:
<Menu Category: Memorabilia>

Was once the MONSTER MIXER RECIPES.

description:
A peculiar key used to unlock doors in
Laeryidyean's Forest. Breaks upon use.
name: Skeleton Key

description:
A tough set of golden bracers that allows
you to move heavier boulders than before.
name: Arm Bracers

description:
A peculiar vial of gel collected from a Rainbow Slime.
It lost its varying colors after the slime dissolved.
name: White Gel
note: <Menu Category: Memorabilia>

description:
A clump of incredibly smooth fur collected
from the corpse of a rare Albino Rat.
name: Albino Rat Fur
note: <Menu Category: Memorabilia>

description:
Colorless leather collected from the clothes of a peculiar
Strange Goblin. Despite its scarcity, it's not useful for crafting.
name: Bleached Leather
note: <Menu Category: Memorabilia>

description:
The spiteful energy of \c[18]Apocalypse\c[0]'s
fiery servants. Gives third-degree burns.
name: Infernal Essence
note:
<Menu Category: Memorabilia>

Was once the Empty Bottle.

description:
Powdery residue produced by intensely heating wood.
All water and volatile constituents have been removed.
name: Charcoal
note:
<Synthesis Ingredients>
Wood
Bark: 5
Fiery Powder
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Wood Remnants>
<Synthesis SE: Fire2>

description:
A strange badge you found in the Village Headman's
chimney. It fills you with the desire to help others.
name: Mysterious Green Badge
note: <Menu Category: Memorabilia>

description:
A peculiar charm that feels like it's phasing through your
hand. Allows the holder to interact with the Phantasmal Plane.
name: Phantasmal Charm

description:
A special salvage kit that allows
you to take apart \ii[43].
name: Wood Salvage Kit
note:
<Disassembler: Wood>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Woodcutting Axe
Copper Cluster: 3
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Another Salvager>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
A bottle of utterly untainted water, taken straight
from the Water Elemental. Drinking it would be a waste.
name: Water Elemental's Pure Water
note: <Menu Category: Memorabilia>

description:
Happy holidays! Used to purchase special equipment
from the holiday merchant during the holiday season.
name: Present
note: <Sell Price: 10>

name: Festive Sword Scroll
note:

<Item Present Sell Price: 1>

Prefix: Festive
Icon: 534
Slots: 0
</Upgrade Effect>

<Item Present Sell Price: 1>

<Upgrade Armor Type: 0>

Reset Icon

description:
I had just one query... boosts
HRG by 3%, lasts for 15 turns.
name: Cranberry Fizz
note:
<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameSwitches.value(103);
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

description:
A large container that holds a sizable amount of water.
Very refreshing! Removes hot status effects.
name: Water Jug
note: <Remove State Category: Fire>

name: ATK Scroll â˜…
note:

<Upgrade Effect>
ATK: +3
Prefix: Sharp
</Upgrade Effect>
<Upgrade Tooltip: ATK +3>

name: MAT Scroll â˜…

<Upgrade Effect>
MAT: +3
Prefix: Occult
</Upgrade Effect>

DEF: +3

MDF: +3

name: PDR Scroll

Eval: item.traits.push({code: 23, dataId: 6, value: 0.99});

</Upgrade Effect>

note:
<Upgrade Armor Type: 2>
<Upgrade Effect>
Eval: item.traits.push({code: 23, dataId: 7, value: 0.99});
Prefix: Spiritual
</Upgrade Effect>

name: GRD Scroll
note:

Eval: item.traits.push({code: 23, dataId: 1, value: 1.50});
Prefix: Determined
</Upgrade Effect>
<Upgrade Tooltip: GRD +50%>

Prefix: Vital
</Upgrade Effect>

Eval: item.traits.push({code: 22, dataId: 8, value: 0.01});
Prefix: Manic
</Upgrade Effect>

<Upgrade Effect>

</Upgrade Effect>

<Upgrade Armor Type: 6, 8>
<Upgrade Effect>
Eval: item.traits.push({code: 23, dataId: 4, value: 0.985});
Prefix: Adept
</Upgrade Effect>
<Upgrade Tooltip: MCR -1.5%>

description:
A handful of powdered tellurium, a relatively rare element.
Can be mined at low depths within the continent of Telluria.
name: Tellurium Dust
note: <Menu Category: Mining>

description:
A powerful alloy that requires several materials to be
forged. Should be chemically impossible, but here we are.
name: Tellurium Alloy
note:
<Menu Category: Mining>
<Sell Price: 250>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Tellurium Dust: 4
Bronze Ingot: 3
Steel Ingot: 2
Fire Essence
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Powerful Alloy>
Was once the Blank Tome.

description:
A strange badge you found in the Dark Forest. It
fills you with the desire to travel the world.
name: Mysterious Yellow Badge
note: <Menu Category: Memorabilia>

description:
An amalgam of all three mysterious badges, which managed to traverse time
and space and arrive here from the demo. Salvage this for a nice surprise!
name: Andrew's Ancient Crystal of The Trail's Amazing History
note:
<Menu Category: Memorabilia>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Mysterious Yellow Badge
Mysterious Green Badge
Mysterious Red Badge
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: ???>
<Synthesis SE: Powerup>
<Synthesis Volume: 150>
<Synthesis Pitch: 50>

<Disassemble Pool: Basic>
x1 Knight Token: 100%
x1 Mage Token: 100%
x1 Cleric Token: 100%
x1 Rogue Token: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Basic>

description: Used for crafting the \ia[109].
name: Knight Token
note: <Menu Category: Memorabilia>

description: Used for crafting the \ia[110].
name: Mage Token
note: <Menu Category: Memorabilia>

description: Used for crafting the \ia[111].
name: Cleric Token
note: <Menu Category: Memorabilia>

description: Used for crafting the \ia[112].
name: Rogue Token
note: <Menu Category: Memorabilia>

description:
A powerful pickaxe with the ability
to break through tellurium ore.
name: Tellurium Pickaxe
note: <Menu Category: Mining>

description:
Half of an ancient tablet found at the peak of an ancient tree.
The complete artifact can break the seal on True Telluria Castle.
name: Golden Tablet Piece (Left)

description:
Half of an ancient tablet found within a frozen labyrinth.
The complete artifact can break the seal on True Telluria Castle.
name: Golden Tablet Piece (Right)

description:
A powerful ancient artifact created and split into two by a group
of mages 1000 years ago. Can break the seal on True Telluria Castle.
name: Golden Tablet
note:
<Synthesis Ingredients>
Golden Tablet Piece (Left)
Golden Tablet Piece (Right)
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: The Key>
<Synthesis SE: Magic3>

description:
A magical herb with defensive properties.
Useful for crafting or buffing defense.
name: Thick-Skinned Herb

description:
A shard of a turtle's shell. Can be used
for a few specific crafting recipes.
name: Turtle Scute
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x4-x6 Ground Monster Parts: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>
Was once the CASTLE FOOD RECIPES.

description:
A simple block of frozen water. Can be
used to chill certain foods and drinks.
name: Ice Cube

description:
The strongest potion you'll find in a normal shop.
Heals more than enough HP for the average traveler.
name: Large Potion

description:
The fizziness is almost overwhelming. You can feel each individual
carbon dioxide atom enter your body. Embrace the fizz.
name: Large Elixir

description:
A somewhat rare root dropped by certain enemies.
Very useful for crafting medicinal items.
name: Medicinal Root

description:
A rather common herb dropped by certain enemies.
Very useful for crafting medicinal items.
name: Medicinal Herb

description:
A carefully brewed potion made with natural ingredients.
It's a bit bitter, but can cure a variety of common debuffs.
name: Dispel Potion
note:
<Synthesis Ingredients>
Water Jug
Medicinal Herb: 3
Medicinal Root: 2
Ice Cube: 5
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Debuff Healer>

description:
A medical alternative to phoenix feathers; revives
a fallen party member. It's not magic, it's science!
name: Stimulant
note:
<Synthesis Ingredients>
Water Jug
Medicinal Herb: 10
Medicinal Root: 5
Ice Cube: 15
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Reviver>

description:
The scale of a dragon which you chipped off during
battle. Used to craft a variety of powerful equipment.
name: Dragon Scale
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x6-x10 Ground Monster Parts: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

description:
A super powerful scale that fell off of Dilong, Dragon of Nature.
Baby Dragons will be able to drop these after Dilong's defeat.
name: Enchanted Dragon Scale
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x15-x25 Ground Monster Parts: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

description:
A single bead of Dilong's tears, immediately crystallized upon
touching a small piece of metal. Or maybe it's just dragon sweat.
name: Dilong's Tear
note: <Menu Category: Memorabilia>

description:
A wing torn off of a Feral Bat during combat.
Much more potent than a normal \ii[82].
name: Feral Bat Wing
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x4-x6 Ground Monster Parts: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

description:
An herb with a punchy flavoring to it.
Buffs your attack temporarily when used.
name: Vicious Herb

description:
An uncooked fungal growth with poison running through its
pores. It's dangerous to eat without preparing it first.
name: Raw Truffle
note:
<Custom Show Eval>
visible = !$gameTemp.bagOrganized();
</Custom Show Eval>

description:
Even though it looks like normal wood, it's been practically
turned to stone after decades of exposure to wet sediments.
name: Petrified Wood

description:
A wad of solidified web fluid dropped
by a spider after its death.
name: Web Ball

description:
A vial of a dangerous toxin taken from a
venomous enemy. You can drink it... but why?
name: Vial of Poison
note: <Enemy or Actor Select>

description:
A high(er)-tech salvage kit that allows for the
disassembling of more complex items and equipment.
name: Advanced Salvage Kit
note:
<Disassembler: Advanced>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Petrified Wood: 20
Tarantula Silk: 10
Feral Bat Wing: 10
Turtle Scute: 5
Steel Ingot: 2
Bronze Ingot
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Stronger Salvager>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
A powerful pickaxe with the ability to break through
tellurium ore. Reduces oreleaf respawn time by 50%.
name: Fertilizing Pickaxe
note:
<Menu Category: Mining>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Tellurium Pickaxe
Tellurium Core
Enchanted Dragon Scale
Plant Essence: 5
Ectoplasm: 3
Bronze Ingot: 10
Steel Ingot: 5
Tellurium Alloy: 3
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Faster Oreleaf Regrowth>

description:
A pickaxe that can break through tellurium. Reduces oreleaf
respawn time by 50%. Has a 20% chance to drop 2 items in 1 hit.
name: Fortunate Pickaxe
note:
<Menu Category: Mining>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Fertilizing Pickaxe
Bronze Ingot: 400
Steel Ingot: 200
Tellurium Alloy: 20
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Extra Ore Per Node>

description:
Can break tellurium. Reduces oreleaf respawn time by 50%.
20% chance to double drops. Produces bits while mining.
name: Gilded Pickaxe
note:
<Menu Category: Mining>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Fortunate Pickaxe
Bronze Ingot: 600
Steel Ingot: 300
Tellurium Alloy: 30
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Mining Money Maker>

description: Boosts the INT of headgear by +2.
name: INT Scroll
note:
<Upgrade Armor Type: 3>
<Upgrade Effect>
LUK: +2
Prefix: Smart
</Upgrade Effect>
<Upgrade Tooltip: INT +2>

description:
A mysterious type of essence dropped
by dark enemies in the Blazing Sands.
name: Malicious Essence

description: A vile, dark metal. It seems to radiate evil energy.
name: Shadowspec Ingot
note:
<Menu Category: Mining>
<Sell Price: 50>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Bronze Ingot
Steel Ingot
Malicious Essence
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Dark Alloy>

description:
A fine line of yarn reinforced
with the webs of a large spider.
name: Tarantula Silk
note:
<Synthesis Ingredients>
Yarn
Web Ball
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Fine Material>

description:
A precious gem used to craft ice-related items.
Dropped by enemies in the Frozen Labyrinth.
name: Frozen Jewel
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Advanced>
x10-15 Ice Cube: 100%
x1-2 Ice Essence: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Advanced>

description:
A small sample of sub-zero gel contained within an airtight
vial. Exposure to this would result in immediate freezing.
name: Icy Gel
note:
<Enemy or Actor Select>

<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x3-5 Ground Monster Parts: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

description:
A musical instrument that produces a very shrill yet
beautiful sound. Allows you to slow the passage of time.
name: Magical Ocarina

description:
A deafening horn that can pierce through the loudest of noise. Use
it inside a dungeon to respawn all enemies inside. Consumed on use.
name: Battle Cry
note:
<Item Dark Essence Buy Price: 2>
<Item Ground Monster Parts Buy Price: 50>

description:
A zesty fruit that explodes into flavor upon a single bite.
Incredible on its own, but a meal with it might be even better...
name: Dragonfruit
note:
<Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

<Custom Show Eval>
visible = !$gameTemp.bagOrganized();
</Custom Show Eval>

description:
A funny-looking fish due to the appendages located on its
chin and the sides of the mouth. It uses these to detect food.
name: Whiskerfish
note: <Menu Category: Fishing>

description:
A tasty group meal consisting of a few common
fish found in Telluria Field's waters.
name: Seafood Dinner
note:
<Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Fathead Carp
Whiskerfish
Northern Redbelly Dace
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Shared Seafood>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
Beginning as a genetic mutation, this crustacean grew to become a regular sight on the
beaches of Telluria. It only coming out at night serves to help it hide from predators.
name: Blue Crab
note: <Menu Category: Fishing>

description:
Chopped up, fried, and lightly garnished crab makes
for a simple yet elegant dish. It's tasty, too!
name: Mana Fritters
note:
<Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Blue Crab
Starfruit
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Magical Seafood>
<Synthesis SE: Equip3>

description:
This fruit, while lightly poisonous, isn't dangerous to humans. It's
said that it contains magical qualities that can spice up any dish.
name: Starfruit
note:
<Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

<Custom Show Eval>
visible = !$gameTemp.bagOrganized();
</Custom Show Eval>

description: Material used to craft the \ia[168] and \ia[124].
name: Wind Catalyst

description:
A combination of several drinks that boosts
most of your core stats by 15% for 15 turns.
name: Well-Rounded Combination
note:
<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameSwitches.value(40);
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

description:
A pale bat wing with magical
energy radiating from it.
name: Ethereal Bat Wing
note: <Menu Category: Memorabilia>

description:
A flute with a peculiar lull that can only be described as slightly
eerie. \c[2]Using it in a certain location may have unintended consequences.\c[0]
name: Ethereal Flute
note:
<Item Feral Bat Wing Buy Price: 10>
<Item Ground Monster Parts Buy Price: 50>

description:
A bit of monster essence broken
down into a warm powder.
name: Fiery Powder
note:
<Menu Category: Materials>

<Craft Amount: 10>
<Synthesis Ingredients>
Fire Essence
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Broken-Down Essence>
<Synthesis SE: Fire2>
Was once the GOLDEN TABLET RECIPE.

description:
The basic tier of membership to the Adventurer's Guild.
Allows access to the Telluria Castle Town branch.
name: Newbie Membership

description:
The intermediate tier of membership to the Adventurer's Guild.
Allows access to all Adventurer's Guild establishments.
name: Journeyman Membership

description:
The highest tier of membership to the Adventurer's Guild.
Provides no special benefits other than flexing... for now.
name: Globetrotter Membership

description: Boosts the EVA of armor by 1%.
name: EVA Scroll
note:
<Upgrade Armor Type: 3, 4, 5>
<Upgrade Effect>
Eval: item.traits.push({code: 22, dataId: 1, value: 0.01});
Prefix: Evasive
</Upgrade Effect>
<Upgrade Tooltip: EVA +1%>

description:
A bundle of organic oats, a cereal grain frequently grown as
livestock feed. Can be refined into a very healthy ingredient.
name: Oats
note: <Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

description: Otherworldly goop dropped by sentient forces of nature.
name: Ectoplasm
note:
<Synthesis Ingredients>
Ectoblood: 2
Gazer Goop
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Ghostly Essence>

<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x9-12 Ground Monster Parts: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

description:
Nature's syringe, easily capable of piercing
flesh and transferring venom into prey.
name: Stinger
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x5-7 Ground Monster Parts: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

description:
A nasty mess of melted red flesh.
Smelling it hurts your nose.
name: Gazer Goop
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x5-7 Ground Monster Parts: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

description:
A small chunk of ghostly essence.
Can be combined into \ii[242].
name: Ectoblood
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x2-3 Ground Monster Parts: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

description: Grants \it[126] for 1200 steps.
name: Fire Resistance Potion
note: <Menu Category: Buffs>

description:
A vial of burning hot plasma that
miraculously doesn't melt the glass.
name: Fiery Blood
note:
<Enemy or Actor Select>

<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x5-7 Ground Monster Parts: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

description:
The essence of natural creatures. Dropped by
plant-related enemies and used for crafting.
name: Plant Essence

description:
The essence of metallic creatures. Dropped by
metal-related enemies and used for crafting.
name: Metal Essence

description:
The purest form of the preservative, harvested directly
from the source. An ingredient for the fancy chef's soup.
name: Salt Rock
note: <Menu Category: Mining>

description:
As cold as cold gets. Do not allow contact with
skin. An ingredient for the fancy chef's soup.
name: Dry Ice Cube

description:
Unlike most seafood served at restaurants, you can really taste
the ocean in this. An ingredient for the fancy chef's soup.
name: Fish-Flavored Fish
note: <Menu Category: Fishing>

description:
Preservable, temperature-controlled, and flavorful; can fish
stew get any better than this? It even... moves on its own?
name: Fancy Stew
note:
<Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Olive Oil
Tomato: 3
Fathead Carp
Rock Salt: 2
Ice Cube: 5
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Boujee Food>

description:
Unlike its giant counterpart, the fur of the
Feral Rat is very effective when used as padding.
name: Feral Rat Fur
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x5-7 Ground Monster Parts: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

description:
A strip of human(?) flesh. Reeks of a putrid
odor. It feels wrong to have this...
name: Rotten Flesh
note:
<Disassemble Pool: Monster>
x5-7 Ground Monster Parts: 100%
</Disassemble Pool: Monster>

description:
Used in a variety of situations, from preparing a
pan for sautÃ©ing to fueling traditional lamps.
name: Olive Oil
note: <Menu Category: Foodstuffs>

description:
A combination of several drinks that boosts
some of your offensive stats by 15% for 15 turns.
name: Offense Combination
note:
<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameSwitches.value(40);
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

description:
A combination of several drinks that boosts
some of your defensive stats by 15% for 15 turns.
name: Defense Combination
note:
<Custom Buy Show Eval>
visible = $gameSwitches.value(40);
</Custom Buy Show Eval>

description:
Purified water blessed by Trailia herself. You
shouldn't drink it, but try using it on a \nl[9] enemy!
name: Holy Water
note:
<Post-Damage Eval>
elements = target.enemy().elements;
if (elements.contains("DARK")) target.addState(66);
</Post-Damage Eval>

description:
Ointment enchanted to heal the user using
their internal magical ability (MP%).
name: Yellow Salve
note:
<Menu Category: Recovery>

<Effects Display>
{"code":11,"dataId":0,"value1":"+MP","value2":0}
</Effects Display>

<Before Eval>
$gameTemp._yellowSalve = Math.max(1, Math.ceil(target.mhp * target.mpRate()));
</Before Eval>
<After Eval>
delete $gameTemp._yellowSalve;
</After Eval>
